Hello, I am Xavier K Muneku

UI/UX Designer & Web Developer

What I do

Design + Development

In today's day and age, I know how fun and rewarding it is for any individual or business to have a top-notch professional website. So that's why I design and develop personalised unique websites from scratch with a focus on the client's preferences and requirements.

E-Commerce

I think the E-Commerce sphere is a very lucrative part of web development for developers because of the high demand. Many businesses especially small ones want to take things to the next level by owning a website, this is in order for them to extend their out reach to a vast range of customers.

WordPress

Of course, everyone has their own preferences but with WordPress and similar software like Wix, Shopify, and Squarespace I'm offered the opportunity to choose from a ton of already made template themes to build and deliver fast-tracked quality websites in no time.

My work

Who I am

Designer & developer based out of Oran, Algeria

I'm totally filled with enthusiasm when it comes to UI/UX Designs and Web Development. Over the past 5 years, I've bombarded myself with all sorts kinds of tech that involves the design and development of websites in order for me to not only diversify my skills and qualities but also build my competence in this field of work.

All that I know about websites is not self taught this is because I am a holder of a Bachelors of Computer Science (BCS) degree, I obtained my degree at the University of Sciences and Technology Oran - Mohamed Boudiaf (USTOMB), Algeria.

Therefore, if you're interested in knowing more about me you can download my curriculum vitae (CV) below.

Download CV
